biography: Susan Shippen Blair was the wife of Samuel Blair, Jr. Her father, Dr. William Shippen, a prominent physician of Philadelphia, helped prepare the plans for Nassau Hall, and became a member of the Continental Congress. Her uncle, Edwared Shippen, the third mayor of Philadelphia, as names a trustee of the College of New Jersey in its second charter; and two brothers, William Shippen, Jr. and John Shippen, graduated in 1754 and 1758 respectively.
